CRUISER Pro Pipe Chrome PG 05-06 Big Radius 2-into-2 PC PG 07-08 Big Radius 2-into-1 PG 09-10 Twin Slash Staggered PG 11-12 Twin Slash Slip-ons PG 13-14 Big Shots PG 15-16 Powershots PG 17 Slash-cut Staggered PG 18 Shortshots Staggered PG 19 Cruzers PG 20 Classic II PG 21 Straightshots / Longshots PG 22 Air / Fuel Management PG 47-48 Application Chart PG 49-50 3
FULL SYSTEM 5 Honda Fury - Pro Pipe Chrome Finish:

PRO PIPE CHROME Featuring a distinctive stepped megaphone design, the Pro Pipe Chrome is the latest evolution in the Vance & Hines 2-into-1 performance legacy and improves performance over its predecessors. • Broad/Usable Torque Increase • Stepped Headers, Large Merge Collector • Optional Quiet and Competition Baffes Available • Available in Chrome Finish COMPLETE THE PACKAGE Air Intake & Fuel Management See Pages 47-48 Suzuki C90 - Pro Pipe Chrome Yamaha V Star 1300 - Pro Pipe Chrome 6
FULL SYSTEM 7 800.592.2529 Yamaha Stryker - Big Radius 2-into-2 PC Finish:

BIG RADIUS 2-INTO-2 PC Big Radius brings together radical custom bike styling with precision quality features like full coverage heat shields and dyno-tuned baffes. • Power Chamber Crossover Technology • Radius Curved Louvered Baffes • Full Coverage Heat Shields • Available in Chrome COMPLETE THE PACKAGE Fuel Management See Page 48 Kawasaki Vulcan 900 - Big Radius 2-into-2 PC Yamaha V Star 950 - Big Radius 2-into-2 PC 8
FULL SYSTEM 9 Yamaha Raider - Big Radius 2-into-1 Finish:

BIG RADIUS 2-INTO-1 Whether on the boulevard or at the dragstrip, Big Radius 2-into-1 can play the part with its fnely sculpted lines and race engineered 2-into-1 design. • Radius Style, 2-into-1 Performance • Broad/Usable Torque Increase • Full Coverage Heat Shields • Available in Chrome COMPLETE THE PACKAGE Fuel Management See Page 48 Yamaha Raider - Big Radius 2-into-1 10
FULL SYSTEM 11 800.592.2529 Suzuki C50 - Twin Slash Staggered Finish:

TWIN SLASH STAGGERED Designed for the middleweight metric cruiser segment, Twin Slash Staggered applies the Vance & Hines signature Twin Slash look to a full system exhaust with blue proof technology at an unbeatable value. • Signature Twin Slash End Treatment • Full Coverage Heat Shields • Available in Chrome or Matte Black Finish • Optional Quiet and Competition Baffes Available COMPLETE THE PACKAGE Fuel Management See Page 48 Suzuki C50 - Twin Slash Staggered Kawasaki Vulcan 900 - Twin Slash Staggered 12
SLIP-ONS 13 800.592.2529 Kawasaki Nomad 1700 - Twin Slash Slip-ons Finish:

TWIN SLASH SLIP-ONS Twin Slash Rounds take the classic look of a round slip-on and add a touch of distinction with a twin slash end treatment, at an unbeatable value. • Best Value Touring Slip-on for Nomad/Voyager • Power Chamber equipped Slip-on for Honda 1300 Custom Line and Fury • Signature Twin Slash End Treatment • Optional Quiet Insert Available for Certain Models COMPLETE THE PACKAGE Air Intake & Fuel Management See Pages 47-48 Yamaha V Star 950 - Twin Slash 2-into-1 Slip-on Honda Fury - Twin Slash Slip-ons 14
FULL SYSTEM 15 800.592.2529 Yamaha V Star 1300 - Big Shots Finish:

BIG SHOTS Big Shots give you the best of both worlds, long and low 2-into-2 style pipes with 2-into-1 performance thanks to the Vance & Hines Power Chamber hidden crossover. • Power Chamber Crossover Technology • Full Coverage Heat Shields • Available in Chrome • Optional Quiet Baffe Available for Certain Models COMPLETE THE PACKAGE Fuel Management See Page 48 Suzuki M109R - Big Shots Yamaha Road Star Warrior - Big Shots 16

FULL SYSTEM powershots Powershots feature a unique look using a single-piece wraparound muffer heat shield while incorporating Power Chamber technology to generate solid power gains for heavyweight cruisers. • Unique Wraparound Muffer Heat Shield Design • Power Chamber Crossover Technology • Full Coverage Heat Shields • Available in Chrome COMPLETE THE PACKAGE Fuel Management See Page 48 17 Kawasaki Vulcan 2000 - Powershots Yamaha Road Star 1700 - Powershots Finish:

FULL SYSTEM slash-cut staggered Designed exclusively for the Kawasaki Vulcan 900, Slash-cut Staggered combines classic styling and a throaty sound with modern blue proof technology for miles of riding joy. • Oversized Muffers • Slash-cut End Treatment • Full Coverage Heat Shields • Available in Chrome COMPLETE THE PACKAGE Fuel Management See Page 48 Kawasaki Vulcan 900 - Slash-cut Staggered Finish: 18

FULL SYSTEM shortshots staggered An unparalleled value, Shortshots Staggered deliver hot rod sound and performance wrapped in full-length heat shields, at a price rivaling most slip-ons. • Signature Twin Slash End Treatment • Full Coverage Heat Shields • Available in Chrome or Matte Black Finish • Optional Quiet Baffe Available COMPLETE THE PACKAGE Fuel Management See Page 48 19 Yamaha V Star 650 - Shortshots Staggered Honda Phantom - Shortshots Staggered Black Finish:

cruzersFULL SYSTEM Cruzers are a value driven full system exhaust with oversized slash-cut muffers giving lightweight and middleweight metric cruisers a big bike sound. • Oversized Muffers • Slash-cut End Treatment • Head Pipe Heat Shields • Available in Chrome COMPLETE THE PACKAGE Fuel Management See Page 48 Honda Aero 750 - Cruzers Suzuki M50 - Cruzers Finish: 20

FULL SYSTEM classic ii One of the original Vance & Hines exhausts for metric cruisers, it remains one of the most popular today with its timeless styling and deep rich v-twin rumble. • Oversized Muffers • Slash-cut End Treatment • Slip-on and Full System Variants • Available in Chrome COMPLETE THE PACKAGE Fuel Management See Page 48 21 Yamaha V Star 1100 - Classic II Slip-ons Suzuki Intruder 800 - Classic II Slip-ons Finish:

FULL SYSTEM longshots / straightshots Whether it’s the staggered look of Straightshots or the stretched out look of Longshots, these systems exude quintessential drag pipe aesthetics with a ferce hot rod sound. • Full Coverage Heat Shields for Certain Models • Available in Chrome • Optional Quiet Baffe Available for Certain Models COMPLETE THE PACKAGE Fuel Management See Page 48 Yamaha Road Star 1700 - Longshots HS Suzuki M50 - Straightshots Finish: 22

OFF-ROAD Ti Pro Dual Chamber PG 25-26 Ti Pro Slip-on PG 27-28 XCR Slip-on PG 29-31 Optional Head Pipes PG 32 Fuel Management PG 48 Application Chart PG 51-52 Steven Tokarski #710 Preston Tilford #74 Classes: 250B/450B, Collegeboy Classes: 250A/Pro Sport, 450A/Pro Sport Building on a strong debut in 2010, Vance & Hines is expanding its motocross program to a two-rider team for the 2011 season, with rising stars Preston Tilford and Steven Tokarski. Each rider will compete on the Yamaha YZ250F and YZ450F in all US amateur motocross national events. For over thirty years, racing has been the driving force of Vance & Hines prod- ucts. Likewise, the motocross team is a critical element to the development of Vance & Hines off-road exhaust systems. In 2010, Vance & Hines introduced its new Dual Chamber technology for the Ti Pro exhaust system on the Yamaha YZ450F, based on the team’s competition efforts at the racetrack. 23
FULL SYSTEM 25 Yamaha YZ450F - Ti Pro Dual Chamber

TI PRO DUAL CHAMBER Developed at the track exclusively for the Yamaha YZ450F, the Ti Pro Dual Chamber features an innovative design using two separate chambers to broaden the power curve and control sound output. • Fixed Race Insert • Full Titanium System (Head Pipe/Mid-Pipe/Muffer) • Meets AMA 94dB Requirements • Reduced Weight Compared to Stock System 26
SLIP-ONS 27 KTM 450EXC - Ti Pro

TI PRO The Ti Pro Slip-on is an excellent upgrade for competition use providing improved performance and weight savings, and can be matched with an optional Titamium head pipe to make a full system. • Titanium Mid-Pipe, Sleeve and End Cap • Fixed Race Insert • Meets AMA 94dB Requirements • Reduced Weight Compared to Stock Slip-on COMPLETE THE PACKAGE Optional Head Pipe See Page 32 Yamaha YZ250F - Ti Pro Honda CRF250R - Ti Pro 28
SLIP-ONS 29 Yamaha WR450F - XCR

XCR The XCR Slip-on is designed for versatility and value with a USFS approved spark arrestor for recreational riding that can be swapped out with a competition insert for track use. • Aluminum Sleeve and End Cap • Includes Removable USFS Approved Spark Arrestor • Meets 96dB Requirements for Recreational Parks • Optional 94dB Insert Available COMPLETE THE PACKAGE Optional Head Pipe See Page 32 Honda CRF250R - XCR Kawasaki KLR650 - XCR 30

SLIP-ONS xcr atv The XCR Slip-on is designed for versatility and value with a USFS approved spark arrestor for recreational riding that can be swapped out with a competition insert for track use. • Aluminum Sleeve and End Cap • Includes Removable USFS Approved Spark Arrestor • Meets 96dB Requirements for Recreational Parks • Optional 94dB Insert Available 31 Kawasaki KFX450R - XCR Yamaha Raptor 700 - XCR

OPTIONAL HEAD PIPES Ideal for matching up with a Ti Pro or XCR slip-on to form a complete system for maximum track performance, these optional head pipes also make great OEM replacements for crash damaged parts. • Stepped Design for Improved Performance • Match with Ti Pro or XCR Slip-on to Make Full System • Excellent Replacement for Damaged Stock Head Pipe • Available in Titanium or Stainless Steel 32
SPORTBIKE CS One Slip-on PG 35-42 Optional Head Pipes PG 43 CS One Full System PG 44 Competition Series PG 45-46 Fuel Management PG 48 Application Chart PG 53-54 33
SLIP-ONS supersport 35 800.592.2529 Kawasaki ZX-10R - CS One 800.592.2529

CS ONE The Supersport category represents the highest level of performance for production motorcycles. The CS One line is engineered to extract additional power, while improving drivability. • Distinctive Trapezoidal Shape • Available in Polished or Matte Black Finish • Easy Slip-ft to OEM Headers • Optional Sound inserts Available COMPLETE THE PACKAGE Fuel Management See Page 48 Yamaha YZF-R1 - CS One Dual Undertail Suzuki GSX-R1000 - CS One 36
SLIP-ONS supersport 37 800.592.2529 Honda CBR1000RR - CS One Tapered

CS ONE The CS One line is acoustically engineered for a more aggressive yet controlled exhaust note to enhance the pleasure of riding, while keeping sound levels at a responsible level. • Distinctive Trapezoidal Shape • Available in Polished or Matte Black Finish • Easy Slip-ft to OEM Headers • Optional Sound inserts Available COMPLETE THE PACKAGE Fuel Management See Page 48 Honda CBR600RR - CS One Undertail Suzuki Hayabusa - CS One Dual 38
SLIP-ONS sport touring 39 800.592.2529 Kawasaki Concours 14 - CS One 800.592.2529

CS ONE The Sport Touring segment yields the best balance of performance and comfort. The CS One line upgrades these distance-oriented performance bikes with improved power and a tuned exhaust note. • Distinctive Trapezoidal Shape • Available in Polished or Matte Black Finish • Easy Slip-ft to OEM Headers • Optional Sound inserts Available COMPLETE THE PACKAGE Fuel Management See Page 48 Yamaha FJR1300 - CS One Dual Kawasaki Concours 14 - CS One 40
SLIP-ONS urban 41 800.592.2529 Kawasaki Ninja 1000 - CS One Urban Brawler

CS ONE The Urban/Streetfghter bike strips the motorcycle back down to its basics. The CS One line adds edgy and compact styling that fows with the vibe of the street. • Distinctive Trapezoidal Shape • Available in Polished or Matte Black Finish • Easy Slip-ft to OEM Headers • Optional Sound inserts Available COMPLETE THE PACKAGE Fuel Management See Page 48 Yamaha VMAX - CS One Dual Ducati 796 - CS One Dual Undertail 42

OPTIONAL HEAD PIPES Available for the Suzuki Hayabusa, these 4-into-2 Performance Headers can be matched with CS One Slip-ons or other aftermarket slip-ons to form a high performance full system. • Lightweight Stainless Steel Construction • Tapered and Stepped Head Pipes • Slip-ft Merge Collectors with Retention Springs • Includes Wideband Oxygen Sensor Port 43 800.592.2529

FULL SYSTEM cs one The Suzuki SV650 is a popular bike of choice among club racers around the country, and Vance & Hines offers a full system version of the CS One, producing excellent performance at the track. • Distintinctive Trapezoidal Shape • 2-into-1 Head Pipes • Available in Matte Black Finish • Optional Sound Inserts Available COMPLETE THE PACKAGE Fuel Management See Page 48 44
FULL SYSTEM 45 800.592.2529 Suzuki GSX-R1000 - Competition Series

COMPETITION SERIES The Competition Series is a line of ultra-high performance drag race exhaust systems developed by the R&D team at the Vance & Hines race shop in Indianapolis. • Lightweight Stainless Steel Construction • Tapered and Stepped Head Pipes • Slip-ft Merge Collectors with Retention Springs • Includes Wideband and EGR Sensor Ports COMPLETE THE PACKAGE Fuel Management See Page 48 Suzuki Hayabusa - Competition Series 46

AIR vo2 air intake kits Along with a high fow exhaust system, a high fow air cleaner kit is an essential upgrade for boosting performance, which is why Vance & Hines has developed the VO2 Air Intake for select Honda motorcycles. • Includes Washable High Flow Filter Element • Includes Large Inlet Backing Plate and Billet Venturi • Available with Duke or Drak Cover Designs • Available in Chrome or Matte Black Finish VO2 Air Intake - Duke Cover YEAR MODEL KIT V&H# HOnDA 09-11 Fury Drak 70011 10-11 Interstate/Stateline/Sabre Drak 70011 09-11 Fury Drak Black 40011 10-11 Interstate/Stateline/Sabre Drak Black 40011 09-11 Fury Duke 70013 10-11 Interstate/Stateline/Sabre Duke 70013 09-11 Fury Duke Black 40013 Duke Black 40013 10-11 Interstate/Stateline/Sabre 47 800.592.2529 VO2 Air Intake - Drak Cover
